docs.snippet: A day after signing new sanctions into law, the president said Washington’s relationship with Moscow was “at an all-time & very dangerous low.”

headline.print_headline: Trump Blames Congress for Poor Relationship With Russia
headline.main: Trump Blames Congress for Poor U.S. Relations With Russia

docs.snippet: The company, whose stock hit a record Wednesday, is leaning on the 1.2 billion iPhones it has sold to push other products and services.

headline.print_headline: How Apple Looks Good At Midlife: Diversifying
headline.main: Why Apple Is Experiencing Another Growth Spurt

docs.snippet: Erik Agard makes us hunt for our theme.
Nontraditional takes on banchan, small plates that are staples of the Korean table, will be the focus of her new restaurant, opening this fall.

headline.main: With Ajjuma, Sunny Lee Plans to Put Korean Sides Front and Center

docs.snippet: German prosecutors say a Vietnamese man was involved in the kidnapping of an executive who had sought refuge from scandal in his homeland.

headline.print_headline: Suspect in Abduction Is Extradited to Germany
headline.main: Vietnamese Abduction Suspect Is Extradited to Germany

docs.snippet: A Russian television station said two cybersecurity officials had been accused of helping the United States, but not of meddling in the 2016 election, as suspected.

headline.print_headline: Two Russians, One Hacker And a Riddle For the U.S.
headline.main: Russians Arrested on Treason Charges Helped U.S. Catch Hacker, Report Says

docs.snippet: Fall will bring reincarnations of La Goulue, Bond 45 and other mourned places.

headline.print_headline: There Are Second Acts in New York, After All
headline.main: Some Lost New York Restaurants Will Get a New Life

docs.snippet: New York is getting a number of new places where you can enjoy a pint and see how it’s made.

headline.main: Why Settle for a Brew When There’s a Whole Brewery?

docs.snippet: Outbreaks of a deadly, sexually transmitted disease confound health officials, whose obstacles include drug shortages, uneducated doctors and gangs.

headline.print_headline: Struggle to Hunt Elusive Killer  As Syphilis Surges Across Nation
headline.main: Hunting a Killer: Sex, Drugs and the Return of Syphilis

docs.snippet: Two Brooklyn roasters, Sey Coffee, in Bushwick, and Nobletree in Red Hook, are unveiling shops that are designed to impress.

headline.print_headline: Where Coffee Roasters Get to Show Off
headline.main: New Coffee Flagships Match Style With Substance
